name: ZooEscape
description:
Do you have what it takes to step into an animal's shoes and escape to freedom? About:

On this particular day the guards of the local city zoo have left your cage unlocked. You are in the cage doing the same routine everyday, it's time for a change, time to be free. In this game you will go through 3 different areas with different types of enemies to finally escape and be set free into the forest to live out your days. 

Features:
  • Movement = Arrow-Keys
  • Sprint = Space-bar
